title: Cat Tale
description: From word to word they find their way, Lillian, Tilly, and William J.Like this:They spot some ewes.They use a box.They box some fleas.And flee a steer . . .First they see, then they do.The only thing missing? You!Come join the fun.Meow!Michael Hall's inquisitive cats set out to spend the afternoon snacking and reading, but wind up chasing words, including homophones and homonyms, on a silly tongue twister of an adventure!
author: Michael  Hall
